name: Little Frogs: 18-36 Months
description: Classes conducted with adults in the water. The little ones start their adventure in the water with the use of games and activities.

name: Sea Turtles: 3-4 Years
description: Classes developing awareness of the aquatic environment. Without the parent's presence in the water.

name: Sharks: 4-12 Years
description: Learning beginner strokes on their backs and fronts. Classes without the participation of adults in the water.

name: Pro Swimmers: 5-12 Years
description: Mastering the technique in four swimming styles: freestyle, backstroke, breaststroke and butterfly. Constantly on the move.

name: Aqua Aerobics
description: Refreshing and invigorating. Get a low impact all-round workout in the shallow water of the swimming pool.

name: Deep Aqua Aerobics
description: High intensity full body workout to build your core strength in the shallow water of the swimming pool.

name: Aqua Fitness
description: Sports activities in the water combined with energetic music are the perfect solution for everyone, even for non-swimmers.

name: Aqua Zumba
description: Zumba classes in the water. The water reaches the waist so you don't need to know how to swim.

name: Children's Day at the Pool
description: Unforgettable experience. The event includes floats, toys and games for children and adults to play together.

name: First Aid for Children
description: Designed for children aged 7-12. Children begin to become more independent and understand basic first aid.

name: Introduction to Climbing
description: Learn the basics of knot tying and belay technique. Designed for people with little or no climbing experience.

name: Introduction to Bouldering
description: Learn the basics of bouldering and basic movement skills. Designed for people with little or no climbing experience.
